name: Morty
line: Geez, I can't believe we found a version of Earth with a Ball Fondlers movie franchise.

name: Summer
line: I can't believe the things this reality considers PG-13

name: Morty
line: Yeah, I'm pretty jealous.

name: Rick
line: Don't be Morty, there are pros and cons to every reality, fun facts about this one; it's got giant telepathic spiders, eleven 9/11's, aaaand the best ice cream in the multiverse!

name: Summer
line: Shut up!

name: Morty
line: W-whoa!

name: Rick
line: We're gonna go get some ice-cream motherfuckers!

name: Rick
line: Oh great.

name: Morty
line: Oh boy. W-what's wrong Rick, is it the quantum carburettor or something?

name: Rick
line: Quantum carburettor? Jesus Morty; you can't just add a sci fi word to a car word and hope it means something. Huh, it looks like something's wrong with the microverse battery - we're going to have to go inside.

name: Morty
line: Uhm. Go inside what?

name: Rick
line: The battery Morty. Be right back Summer; stay put, don't touch any buttons, and ignore all random thoughts that feel -- spider-y.

name: Summer
line: Wait! You can't leave me here!

name: Rick
line: You'll be fine. Ship, keep Summer safe.

name: Ship
line: Keep. Summer. Safe.

name: Summer
line: Egh, wonderful.

name: Man
line: Hey, excuse me, hello?

name: Summer
line: Uhmm...

name: Man
line: What you think you're better than me? Nobody's better than me! Ey! ey!

name: Summer
line: Agh! Aghaaaa!

name: Ship
line: Keep. Summer. Safe.

name: Thinner Man
line: Hey man, what the hell! That was my daughter's paediatrician!

name: Summer
line: No! Stop, don't kill him!

name: Ship
line: Confirmed.

name: Thinner Man
line: Uaghuu. Ugh. Uh. Oh God! I can't feel my legs! Help! He-elp!

name: Ship
line: Summer is safe.

name: Summer
line: I don't feel safe.

name: Ship
line: Confirmed.

name: Thinner Man
line: Oh God help me! Help me! help me please! You can help me.

name: Morty
line: Oh man. Where are we Rick?

name: Rick
line: Morty, remember eight seconds ago when -burp- when you said 'go inside what' and I said 'the battery' and then we showed up here?

name: Rick
line: Morty, remember eight seconds ago when [Burps] when you said, "Go inside what?" And I said, "The battery"? And then we showed up here, and I wasn't like, "Whoa, this is unexpected. This is not what I was expecting, Morty. What a perplexing mystery this is."

name: Morty
line: All right, all right. We're inside the battery. I get it. You don't have to bust my balls.

name: Rick
line: Huh, this isn't right. This pipe's supposed to be sending 20 terawatts of juice up to the engine, Morty.

name: Rick
line: Instead we've got... zero? Now what are these people doing?

name: Morty
line: W-w-w-whoa, people? [Groans]

name: Rick
line: It's time for some hands-on engine repair.All right, Morty, hold on to something.

name: Morty
line: Whoa!

name: Morty
line: Holy crap! I thought we were inside your car battery, Rick. T-t-this is like a whole p-planet or something.

name: Rick
line: Thanks, Morty. I'm pretty proud of this bad boy. Check it out.

name: Rick
line: I put a spatially tessellated void inside a modified temporal field until a planet developed intelligent life. I then introduced that life to the wonders of electricity, which they now generate on a global scale. And, you know, some of it goes to power my engine and charge my phone and stuff.

name: Morty
line: You have a whole planet sitting around making your power for you? That's slavery.

name: Rick
line: It's society. They work for each other, Morty. They pay each other. They buy houses. They get married and make children that replace them when they get too old to make power.

name: Morty
line: That just sounds like slavery with extra steps.

name: Rick
line: Ooh-la-la, someone's gonna get laid in college.

name: Anchor
line: It appears we are being revisited by the alien known as Rick, who once gave our world the gift of gooble box technology, which, when stomped on, generates electricity, powering our homes and businesses, improving our daily lives, while safely removing the dangerous waste power to a special disposal volcano. But why has Rick returned? And what will he say when he hears the big news? Let's find out.

name: Morty
line: You need to tell these people they're in a battery, Rick. It's messed up. There's caterers down there. Th-th-they're setting up chafing dishes.

name: Rick
line: Would you relax, Morty? There's nothing dishonest about what we're doing. Now slap on these antennae. These people need to think we're aliens.

name: Morty
line: What? Why?

name: Rick
line: Obviously [burps] you really [burps] know nothing about car repair.

name: Rick
line: Wait for the ramp, Morty. They love the slow ramp. Really gets their dicks hard when they see this ramp just slowly extending down.

name: Rick
line: Greetings!

name: Rick
line: Morty, you got to flip them off. I told them it means "Peace among worlds." How hilarious is that?

name: Rick
line: Coming through. Two real aliens walking through here.

name: Mr.President
line: Rick, our alien friend.

name: Rick
line: Uh, Mr. President, um, couldn't help but notice that you were having problems generating power.

name: Mr.President
line: That's correct. [Chuckles] We've evolved. Our most brilliant scientist, Zeep Xanflorp, has developed a source of energy that makes gooble boxes obsolete.

name: Rick
line: [Straining] I would love to see it.

name: Mr.President
line: [Bleep] you.

name: Rick
line: What did you say to me?!

name: Mr.President
line: "[Bleep] you." Y-you told me it means "much obliged".

name: Rick
line: Oh. Right. Uh, b-blow me.

name: Mr.President
line: No, no, no. Blow me.

name: Mr.President
line: Zeep, you have an honored guest from beyond the stars.

name: Zeep
line: I said 12 quantum stabilizers, not 11. Fix it or it's your ass. Chris, I'm in the middle of something.

name: Mr.President
line: Zeep, is Rick-- The alien. Rick the alien. Rick the alien...

name: Rick
line: Really? You're gonna pull that move? I guided your entire civilization. Your people have a holiday named Ricksgiving. They teach kids about me in school.

name: Zeep
line: I dropped out of school. It's not a place for smart people.

name: Morty
line: Ohhhh, snap!

name: Rick
line: Listen to me, you arrogant little--

name: Mr.President
line: [Chuckling] R-Rick was hoping to see your new energy source. I think he could learn a lot from you, Zeep.

name: Zeep
line: Fine. It's hard for people to grasp, but inside that container is an infinite universe with a planet capable of generating massive amounts of power. I call it a miniverse.

name: Rick
line: [Coughs] Dumb [coughs] name.

name: Zeep
line: Excuse me?

name: Rick
line: [Clears throat] Nothing. I mean, it's hard for us to comprehend all this. Would it be possible for us to get some kind of tour of your miniverse from the inside?

name: Zeep
line: This isn't a [bleep] chocolate factory. I don't have time.

name: Mr.President
line: Didn't you say time goes more slowly in the miniverse relative to the real world?

name: Zeep
line: Yes, Chris. Thanks for reminding me of that. Great president. All right, let's go.

name: Morty
line: Whoa-oh!

name: Zeep
line: Hold on to something. I put an unbounded vacuum inside a temporal field until a world developed. I then introduced the people of this world to the wonders of electricity in the form of a device I call a flooble crank.

name: Zeep
line: What they don't know is that 80% of every crank's energy output gets channeled out of the miniverse to be used by us. No more gooble boxes.

name: Rick
line: I got to tell you, Zeep, with no disrespect, I really think what you're doing here is unethical. It's not cool.

name: Morty
line: What?!

name: Rick
line: Y-y-you got the people on this world slaving away [burps] making your power. I mean, that's what I call slavery.

name: Zeep
line: No, no, no, they work for each other in exchange for money, which they then--

name: Zeep
line: Eek barba dirkle, somebody's gonna get laid in college.

name: Morty
line: Rick, a word?

name: Morty
line: What the hell was that?

name: Rick
line: I know. "Eek barba dirkle"? That's a pretty [bleep] up "ooh-la-la".

name: Morty
line: No, what are you doing telling this guy that his miniverse is unethical? Do you not see the hypocrisy here?

name: Rick
line: Holy crap. You're right, Morty. Hypocrisy. Somewhere on this planet, there's got to be an arrogant scientist prick on the verge of microverse technology, which would threaten to make Zeep's flooble cranks obsolete, forcing Zeep to say microverses are bad, at which point he'll realize what a hypocrite he's being, his people will go back to stomping on their gooble boxes, and you and I will be on ice cream street, baby! Eating that mother[bleep] ice cream! Slurping, slurping, slurping it up.

name: Rick
line: Wh-wh-why are you making that face?

name: Morty
line: Holy Shit[bleep]!

name: Zeep
line: It's me. I've convinced the people of this planet that I'm a traveler from another world.

name: Rick
line: You don't think that's over[Burps]doing it a little? I mean, you could achieve the same effect with a pair of-- Never mind. You know what? I shouldn't be so critical. I'm an alien.

name: Zeep
line: Places, please. We're about to land.

name: Rick
line: [Coughs] Too fast.

name: Summer
line: [Whimpering]

name: Ship
line: Law enforcement converging on location. Keep Summer safe.

name: Summer
line: No! No, no! Don't hurt anybody!

name: Ship
line: [Warble] Confirm custom defense protocol-- Keep Summer safe-- No physical force.

name: Summer
line: Yes.

name: Ship
line: Processing.

name: Swat Officer 1
line: Come out of the vehicle with your hands in the air!

name: Ship
line: Scanning assailants. [Warbling, beeping] Psychological option detected. [Beeping] Gestating.

name: Summer
line: "Gestating"?

name: Swat Officer 1
line: Come out with your hands up, or we will be forced to open fire!

name: Swat Officer 1
line: Incoming!

name: Swat Officer 2
line: We got a device!

name: Swat Officer 1
line: Bomb! Bomb!

name: Kid
line: Daddy?

name: Swat Officer 1
line: Oh, my God. [Sighs] Hunter?

name: Kid
line: Daddy?

name: Summer
line: What the hell?

name: Swat Officer 1
line: [Gasps] Jesus Christ, cease fire! Stay back! H-h-hunter?

name: Kid
line: Daddy.

name: Swat Officer 1
line: Hunter! [Sobbing] Oh, my dear, sweet God, Hunter. Oh, my boy. My boy. I'm sorry. I'm sorry. It was all my fault. I'm sorry.

name: Kid
line: Daddy, leave the car alone.

name: Swat Officer 1
line: W-w-w-what?

name: Kid
line: [Distorted] Leave the car alone.

name: Swat Officer 1
line: Hunter?

name: Swat Officer 1
line: Don't--

name: Summer
line: Oh, my God.

name: Swat Officer 1
line: Stay here, Hunter! No! [Sobbing] God, no! Hunter!

name: Ship
line: All of you have loved ones. All can be returned. All can be taken away. Please step away from the vehicle. Keep Summer safe.

name: Zeep
line: And if you continue to turn your flooble cranks, I will bring you other great alien advancements.

name: Rick
line: Hey, uh, let me ask you something.

name: Teenyverse President
line: Yes?

name: Rick
line: Any of your, uh, scientists working on anything new?

name: Teenyverse President
line: All of them. That's their job.

name: Rick
line: Yeah, yeah, yeah. But I mean, like, energy-wise. Anyone working on, say, a little universe in a box?

name: Teenyverse President
line: How do you know about that? It's top secret.

name: Zeep
line: So remember-- a crank a day is not nearly enough. [Laughs] Crank it. I told them this means "Peace among worlds". How hilarious is that?

name: Morty
line: Re-really funny, Zeep.

name: Rick
line: Hey, Zeep, the fake president of your fake world has something fake important to show you.

name: Kyle
line: It's not much now, but once I learn to accelerate the temporal field, I'll be able to interact with any sentient life that evolves and introduce them to the wonders of electricity via a pulley-based device I call a blooble yank. But what they won't know is--

name: Zeep
line: You'll be taking most of their energy. Yeah, yeah, yeah. I get it.

name: Rick
line: [Burps] It's show [Burps]time.

name: Zeep
line: You do realize this will make the flooble crank obsolete? This is wrong, Kyle. What you're doing is wrong. You're basically-- This is slavery. You're talking about creating a planet of slaves.

name: Rick
line: [Burps] Told you, Zeep.

name: Kyle
line: Oh, they won't be slaves. They'll work for each other and pay each other money.

name: Zeep
line: That just sounds like slavery with ex... tra... steps.

name: Rick
line: What?

name: Zeep
line: Wait a minute. Did you create my universe? Is my universe a miniverse?

name: Rick
line: Microverse!

name: Kyle
line: Uh, teenyverse.

name: Rick
line: Ugh! You b*st*rd!

name: Zeep
line: Much obliged.

name: Kyle
line: What the hell is happening?

name: Morty
line: This is healthy, trust me.

name: Rick
line: You're my battery, mother[bleep]. [Groans] That's all you are. I made you. Your microverse sucks! And your miniverse is the size of a [bleep] lobster tank! It's whack!

name: Kyle
line: Are they not really aliens?

name: Morty
line: Nah, they're just a couple of crazy, wacky scientists, you know?

name: Kyle
line: So he made a universe, and that guy is from that universe. And that guy made a universe. And that's the universe where I was born. Where my father died. Where I couldn't make time for his funeral because I was working on my universe.

name: Rick
line: I made you!

name: Morty
line: [Laughs] Yeah. Science, huh? Ain't it a thing.

name: Morty
line: You know, one time, Rick sh-- accidentally shot his laser pistol right through my hand. You know, I mean, like, old-lady science, you know? She's a real-- You got to hang on tight, you know? Because she-- she'll-- She bucks pretty hard. Ooh, boy, what-- Oh, my God, no!

name: Rick, Zeep
line: Teenyverse.

name: Rick
line: Come on, come on, come on.

name: Rick
line: Pterodactyl!

name: Zeep
line: [Laughs] Asshole! When I get out of this teenyverse, I'm gonna smash it to pieces with you in it.

name: Rick
line: Yeah, well, when I get out of this teenyverse, I'm gonna get out of the surrounding miniverse and then the microverse around that, and guess what?

name: Morty
line: Don't make things worse, Rick! Uh, he's not gonna destroy your universe. You know, we-- We need it to start our car.

name: Zeep
line: That's what you used my universe for? To run your car?

name: Rick
line: Yeah, but don't flatter yourself. There's always AAA, you fucking cocksucker!

name: Rick
line: What's he doing? What's he crafting? I can craft stuff, too, pal! Just like I crafted your reality!

name: Rick
line: You crafty son of a--

name: Zeep
line: Ow! I crafted the guy that created the planet you're standing on!

name: Rick
line: Yeah, and I made the stars that became the carbon in your mother's ovaries!

name: Zeep
line: I didn't ask to be born!

name: Morty
line: All right, that's it! I'm out. I-I'm gonna go into the wilderness, and I'm gonna make a new life for myself among the tree people. It can't be worse than this.

name: Rick
line: Sure. Okay, Morty. Just be back before sundown or the tree people will eat you.

name: Morty
line: That's a myth! W-w-why are you trying to start a myth?

name: Rick
line: It's a prehistoric planet, Morty. Someone has to bring a little culture. And it certainly can't be someone whose entire culture powers my brake lights!

name: Army General
line: Go, go, go!

name: Summer
line: Oh, my God. Oh, God. What are we going to do now?

name: Ship
line: I am unable to destroy this army. To clarify, I am quite able to destroy this army, but you will not permit it.

name: Summer
line: Correct.

name: Ship
line: You also refuse to authorize emotional countermeasures.

name: Summer
line: If you're talking about the melting ghost babies, yes, please, no more of that.

name: Ship
line: [Warble] Confirmed. I am currently constructing a security measure in compliance with your parameters. But I do want to say you are not making this easy.

name: Summer
line: You know you're kind of a dick, right?

name: Rick
line: Hey, that's my deer!

name: Zeep
line: Aaaaaaah!

name: Rick
line: Raah!

name: Zeep
line: I hope your God is as big a dick as you.

name: Rick
line: My God's the biggest dick that's never existed. Why do you think I'm even here?

name: Zeep
line: You're here because you created someone smarter than you.

name: Rick
line: Oh, I thought we were both here because I created a universe of idiots.

name: Morty
line: Kalo kada sha la.

name: Rick
line: Holy shit. Morty? I haven't seen you in months. You're leading the tree people? Huh. That's a step up.

name: Morty
line: We have no leaders. We follow only the will of the forest.

name: Rick
line: Ooh. Wow. Gaaaaay.

name: Zeep
line: That is pretty gay.

name: Morty
line: You two call yourselves geniuses, but you have spent this time learning nothing. Come with me into the forest. There is something I wish to teach you.

name: Morty
line: This is Ku'ala, the spirit tree. For generations, it has guided the-- You have to get us the fuck out of here. These people are backwards savages. They eat every third baby because they think it makes fruit grow bigger. Everyone's gross, and they all smell like piss all the time. I m-- I miss my family. I miss my laptop. I masturbated to an extra-curvy piece of driftwood the other day!

name: Morty
line: Look, I don't care what it takes. You two are putting aside your bullshit, and you're working together to get us back home.

name: Rick
line: No can do, Morty. I just can't.

name: Zeep
line: I just don't see how I can--

name: Morty
line: Ro ro dah no gah! You're smart. You'll figure it out.

name: Army General
line: You have 10 seconds to get out of the ship! 10, 9...

name: Rick
line: All right, not bad.

name: Zeep
line: I guess you're an okay proto recombinator.

name: Rick
line: I've certainly seen worse ionic cell dioxination.

name: Zeep
line: If this works, drinks are on me.

name: Rick
line: If drinks are on you, you're gonna need a second mortgage on that tower. I'm an alcoholic.

name: Zeep
line: Opium addict.

name: Morty
line: All right, okay, okay, okay, wrap it up. You guys are the [bleep] worst! Your gods are a lie! [Bleep] you, [bleep] nature, and [bleep] trees!

name: Morty
line: Yes! You did it! Yes!

name: Rick
line: Hey, uh, how about that drink?

name: Zeep
line: Sure, I just need to go grab my wallet from inside my ship.

name: Rick
line: Is our wallet in your ship? That's where the transporter is, too, so why don't we come with?

name: Zeep
line: It's cool. I'll be back in a sec.

name: Rick
line: You know how long a second can take in a microverse?

name: Rick
line: Oh! Run, Morty! That asshole's willing to risk everything he cares about just to defeat me! He's psychotic!

name: Rick
line: Morty, hop on my back.

name: Morty
line: Why?

name: Rick
line: Go, go [Burps] Sanchez ski shoes.

name: Morty
line: Aaaaaah!

name: Army General
line: ...Eight...

name: Morty
line: Aaaah!

name: Rick
line: Oof!

name: Rick
line: Hold still. [Grunts]

name: Mr. President
line: Oh, hey, guys. I just finished cooking us a feast.

name: Rick
line: Aaaah! Holy--

name: Zeep
line: You monster!

name: Mr. President
line: Whoa. Bad tour.

name: Army General
line: ...seven...

name: Secretary
line: Hey, you got to sign out.

name: Rick
line: Nothing you do matters! Your existence is a lie!

name: Secretary
line: If that were really true, then...

name: Female Visitor
line: I'm here to see Ron Mendleson.

name: Secretary
line: Third floor. Would you like to go to dinner with--

name: Female Visitor
line: Uh, no.

name: Zeep
line: You may have created this universe, Rick, but I live in it.

name: Morty
line: What are we gonna do, Rick? We're so screwed. He's gonna get to the ship and smash the microverse, and then he's gonna kill us!

name: Rick
line: Quick, Morty, you've got to turn into a car.

name: Morty
line: What?!

name: Rick
line: A long time ago, I implanted you with a subdermal chip that could call upon dormant nanobots in your bloodstream to restructure your anatomy and turn you into a car.

name: Morty
line: Oh, my God!

name: Rick
line: Concentrate, Morty. Concentrate and turn into a car, Morty.

name: Morty
line: [Grunts]

name: Rick
line: Never mind. Here's a taxi. Get in. It's fine.

name: Rick
line: Hey, Zeep.

name: Zeep
line: Huh?

name: Rick
line: Happy Ricksgiving, biiiiiitch.

name: Zeep
line: Aaah!

name: Rick
line: We did it, Morty. Now let's get out of here and destroy this whole universe.

name: Taxi Driver
line: Excuse me?

name: Army General
line: ...five--

name: Soldier
line: Sir?

name: Army General
line: Holy hell.

name: Soldier
line: Sir!

name: Human President
line: Hold you fire!

name: Summer
line: What's going on?

name: Ship
line: I have brokered a peace agreement between the giant spiders and the government.

name: Human President
line: Thanks to the skilled diplomacy of this mysterious space car, from this day forward, human- and spiderkind will live side by side in peace. We will stop bombing them, and they will no longer use their telepathic abilities to make us wander into webs for later consumption. Instead, we will work together to make this world a better place for all, no matter how many legs.

name: Soldier
line: What do we do about the space car?

name: Human President
line: Leave it alone. I mean, what did it really do, anyways? Kill a guy and paralyze his buddy? [Chuckles] Not a bad trade for spider peace.

name: Army General
line: .All right, that's it. Move out!

name: Human President
line: [Laughs] I love this spider!

name: Ship
line: Summer is safe.

name: Summer
line: All right, I get it.

name: Zeep
line: Rick!

name: Morty
line: Don't do it.

name: Rick
line: You quit school, but you still got some learning to do. [Both groan]

name: Zeep
line: Aah!

name: Rick
line: Unh!

name: Rick
line: Class dismissed.

name: Morty
line: Geez.

name: Rick
line: You all right?

name: Summer
line: Uh-huh!

name: Morty
line: What are you doing, Rick? I'm pretty sure the battery's dead.

name: Rick
line: Oh, you think so, huh, Morty? Well, let's see.

name: Morty
line: Hey, wait-- huh? I don't get it.

name: Rick
line: Of course you don't. But Zeep did. He knew that once I got back to my car, one of two things was gonna happen-- I was gonna have to toss a broken battery, or the battery wouldn't be broken.

name: Zeep
line: Peace among worlds, Rick.

name: Morty
line: Jesus.

name: Rick
line: Yeah. Listen to that baby purr. You were right, Morty-- We really just needed to be honest with those guys. All right, here we go.

name: Rick
line: Thank y-o-o-ou. See, Morty? This is what it's all about.This is why we do what we do.

name: Morty
line: Uh-huh.

name: Rick
line: Ew! What the hell? Jesus! There's flies in my ice cream.

name: Ice cream clerk
line: Presidential decree-- All ice cream is now for all beings, no matter how many legs.

name: Rick
line: What the fuck did you do, Summer?!

name: Summer
line: It was your ship! Your stupid ship did it!

name: Rick
line: Don't blame my ship!

name: Summer
line: It melted a child!

name: Rick
line: My ship doesn't do anything...

name: Summer
line: It killed it itself!

name: Rick
line: ...unless it's told to do something!

name: Summer
line: We almost died!

name: Rick
line: I don't want to hear it, Summer!

name: Rick
line: Your boobs are all hanging about, and you ruined ice cream with your boobs out. And don't even try to deny it, either.

name: Morty
line: [Groans]
